thread.title: 'Whitey' Bulger's lover pleads not guilty to contempt charge
thread.title_full: 'Whitey' Bulger's lover pleads not guilty to contempt charge - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: 'Whitey' Bulger's lover pleads not guilty to contempt charge
text:
BOSTON (AP) - The longtime girlfriend and fugitive companion of James "Whitey" Bulger has pleaded not guilty to a contempt charge for refusing to say whether other people helped the Boston mobster during his 16 years on the run.
Catherine Greig (grehg) entered the plea Monday on the new charge in U.S. District Court. A judge ordered her to return Nov. 19.
The 64-year-old Greig is serving an eight-year sentence for conspiracy to harbor a fugitive, identity fraud and conspiracy to commit identity fraud.
The indictment alleges that from December 2014 until last month, Greig disobeyed a judge's order to testify before a grand jury in an investigation into who assisted and harbored Bulger.
Bulger fled Boston before being indicted in 1995. He and Greig were captured in Santa Monica, California, in 2011.
